goals__remit: The Institute for Complex Quantum Systems is a department of the Faculty of natural Sciences of the university of Ulm. It is involved in several European funded research projects.
relevant_communication:
Coordinator of the FET project SIQS (Simulators and Interfaces with Quantum Systems) and RySQ (Rydberg Quantum Simulators) 
Chairman of the Strategy Advisory Board of the FET Coordination Action QUTE-EUROPE
